“WOW” BIG PRICE DROP $370,000 Make this lovely 4-bedroom 2 bath rancher your new home. Very warm and inviting. New heat pump air conditioning unit put in less than two years ago, fresh paint throughout. Stove, refrigerator and microwave purchased less than 1 year ago. Beautiful hardwood flooring in formal living and dining room also in the great room. This Beauty won't last for long so come by and see for yourself. Seller will be reviewing all offers on Saturday August 26th 6pm.

Free First-Time Home Buying Seminar
September 21, 2023
2143 Staples Mill Road
Richmond, VA 23230

We're having a free, First-Time Home Buyers' Seminar on Thursday, September 21 at 6 P.M. Please forward this information to your friends, neighbors, family members, and co-workers and ask them to do the same. You never know who might benefit from learning the process of buying their first home.

The class will save you time, money, and worry, even if you've owned a home before. Here are a few of the topics:

1. Understanding your credit score.
2. What lenders are looking for when approving you for a home loan.
3. Information on how to buy a home with zero down payment.
4. Help answering the question, "Am I ready to buy a home?"
5. How to obtain free computer searches of all homes in your future neighborhood.
6. The ins and outs of negotiation, which will save you thousands.

You'll leave this free seminar with a clear vision of how the process comes together, as well as a free Home Buyer's Handbook for easy reference.


Reserve Your Space Today by Calling 804-354-6000

Call Lifelong Realty, Inc. Today! 804-354-6000

2227 Rosewood Avenue

Call Lifelong Realty, Inc. Today! 804-354-6000

Price Reduction! Come make this your home! Located in the heart of Byrd Park and in walking distance to Swan Lake, the Tennis Courts, Maymont Park, and in close proximity to Carytown, Museums and Restaurants! It features a formal living room with a fireplace, french doors leading to the formal dining room, hardwood floors and newer windows throughout. The Kitchen includes all appliances and a butler's pantry. There are 3 bedrooms on the 2nd floor, with the primary bedroom suite boasting a connecting room, which would make a great office. There is a full front porch and an enclosed rear porch overlooking a landscaped fenced in yard with an outside shed for storing your grilling and gardening essentials. The walkout basement provides your laundry/utility area. Location! Location! Location!

2.details:
2416 Mimosa Street

Call Today! 804-354-6000

New Price! This lovely three-level home with a private fenced-in garden is ready for you to call home. Your new home features a beautiful wraparound porch with recessed lights, a covered side deck off the kitchen with recessed lights, an attached storage shed, and a rear privacy fence. The first level offers a generously sized living room with recessed lights and a stylish ceiling fan; a cozy office with a ceiling fan; a captivating kitchen; and luxury vinyl plank flooring. The kitchen boasts a robust island with a bar-height counter, stunning pendant lights, and a nicely-sized dining area. The 2nd level includes 3 bedrooms, all of which are carpeted and have ceiling fans, and 2 full bathrooms that are highlighted by a decorative tub surround that will simply wow you. The owner’s bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with double sink vanities and light fixtures that beautifully merge uniqueness with elegance. The 3rd level can be used as a 4th bedroom, a movie room, or a rec room – you choose! Ask about a special loan program for first-time and move up buyers with zero PMI and up to $5,000 in grants! The seller is offering $5,000 towards a price reduction or closing costs!

Immense terrain de plus de 818 pc de profondeur vous offrant un chemin privé et 1 maison blanche pouvant être transformer en 2e habitation pour un membre de votre famille ou espace bureau (électricité, l'eau et les égouts sont déjà dans la maison). Immense propriété ayant subit des rénovations majeures avec sa nouvelle fondation, amélioration de la demeure existante, ajout d'un 2e étage et bachelor complémentaire au sous-sol. Le propriétaire a reçu son permis de gite touristique pour de la location de chambre à court terme. Investissement de choix avec plusieurs options pour vous. Venez voir!

The property features three spacious, sunlit bedrooms with the option to expand to five, accommodating families of various sizes. The kitchen has been thoughtfully renovated to provide ample storage space, and the bathroom has been modernized for elegant comfort. The backyard is a true paradise, perfect for hosting friendly gatherings and creating memorable moments. For more details, you can contact Paulina Urra Inc., a real estate broker at Re/Max Performance Inc., at 438-866-2204.This charming maison de plain-pied offers a versatile living space suitable for families of different sizes, with the potential for up to five bedrooms. The renovated kitchen and modernized bathroom enhance the home's comfort and functionality. Additionally, the property boasts a delightful backyard, perfect for hosting gatherings and creating lasting memories. For further information or inquiries, please contact Paulina Urra Inc., a real estate broker at Re/Max Performance Inc., at 438-866-2204. The house is located in Saint-Basile-le-Grand, Quebec, and is listed for $549,900, offering 1,013 square feet of living space.

questions: What are the key features of the property at 960 Ch. Duhamel in Pincourt?
Can you provide details about the pricing and contact information for this property?
Are there specific amenities or unique features that make this property stand out?
What is the size of the property at 960 Ch. Duhamel, and how many bedrooms and bathrooms does it have?
Has the property received any official permits, such as a tourist accommodation permit for short-term room rentals?
answers: The property is a prestigious intergenerational home with income potential, located on the waterfront. It has a 64-foot frontage and a spacious lot of over 818 square feet. The house has undergone major renovations, including a new foundation, improvements to the existing dwelling, the addition of a second floor, and a complementary bachelor unit in the basement.
The property is listed at $1,295,000, and the contact person is Xavier Grelier Inc. You can reach them at 514-815-9719. The property is located in Pincourt, QC, with the postal code J7W4H1.

The property is situated on the waterfront, offering a serene environment with a private path. Additionally, there's a white house on the premises that can be transformed into a second dwelling for a family member or used as office space. The house already has electricity, water, and sewer connections.
The property has a square footage of 2,700. It features five or more bedrooms and four or more bathrooms, making it spacious and suitable for a large family or various usage scenarios.
Yes, the owner has obtained a tourist accommodation permit, allowing for the short-term rental of rooms. This adds an investment dimension to the property, providing potential income opportunities.
